p.s: The given speech Boris Johnson, British Prime Minister address at COP26 World Leaders' Summit Opening Ceremony by Boris Johnson, delivered on November 1 2021, deals with Johnson's view of climate change.
Boris Johnson held his speech in Glasgow at COP26.
He says that the climate change is like a bomb which can detonate after a time of defusing.
In addition Johnson compares us with James Bond, who can defusesdefuse a bomb simply.
Novertheless the temperature of the planet is increasing without any countermeasures.
He tells the audience that the plan of 1.5 degree was in Paris just some useless words.
Furthermore Boris Johnson says that they have to spend more money to fight against the climate change and to help other poorer countries.
Johnson thinks that they have the right technology and the devices to go against the climate change but they also need the will.
The importance of COP26 is the start of a fight.
Fight against climate change to help the next generations and to offer them a better life.
In the end of his speech Johnson goes back to his comparison of the climate change with a bomb.
